main event: A security observer from the Oregon Highway Department reported seeing an unidentified aerial object over Lookout Mountain, Oregon for 17 minutes on October 9, 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as 25 feet in diameter, hovering, and exhibiting erratic control.
The object changed color from white to reddish for 4-15 seconds.
The object moved at a velocity of around 30,000 feet per minute.
The object was initially sighted at 3:15 PM local time and was observed until 3:37 PM.
The sighting was evaluated as possibly being a weather balloon, but the report noted the validity of the sighting remained doubtful.
sighted object: A 25-foot diameter unidentified aerial object that changed color and exhibited erratic movement
witnesses: A security observer from the Oregon Highway Department
photographs: No photographs included in the report
